scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node -r dotenv/config src/src/main.ts dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.start:dev:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node -r dotenv/config src/src/main.ts dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node -r dotenv/config src/src/main.ts dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.start:prod:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node -r dotenv/config src/src/main.ts dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.serve:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config dist/main.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.serve:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config dist/main.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
